boundary.description: The boundary area for the popper. Used within the `preventOverflow` modifier.

clearIconProps.description: Props for date picker clear icon element.

closeOnBlur.description: If `true`, the popover will close when you blur out it by clicking outside or tabbing out.

closeOnEsc.description: If `true`, the popover will close when you hit the `Esc` key.

closeOnSelect.description: If `true`, the list element will be closed when value is selected.

colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component.

containerProps.description: Props for date picker container element.

dateFormat.description:
The format used for conversion.
Check the docs to see the format of possible modifiers you can pass.

defaultIsOpen.description: If `true`, the popover will be initially opened.

defaultMonth.description: The initial month of the calendar.

defaultType.description: The initial type of the calendar.

defaultValue.description: The initial value of the calendar.

disableOutsideDays.description: If `true`, outside days will be disabled.

errorBorderColor.description: The border color when the input is invalid.

eventListeners.description: If provided, determines whether the popper will reposition itself on `scroll`  and `resize` of the window.

excludeDate.description: Callback function to determine whether the day should be disabled.

firstDayOfWeek.description: Define the first day of the week.

flip.description: If `true`, the popper will change its placement and flip when it's about to overflow its boundary area.

focusBorderColor.description: The border color when the input is focused.

gutter.description:
The distance or margin between the reference and popper.
It is used internally to create an `offset` modifier.

iconProps.description: Props for date picker icon element.

inputFormat.description:
The format used for conversion.
Check the docs to see the format of possible modifiers you can pass.

inputProps.description: Props for date picker input element.

isClearable.description: If `true`, display the date picker clear icon.

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the form control will be disabled.

isInvalid.description: If `true`, the form control will be invalid.

isLazy.description: If `true`, the PopoverContent rendering will be deferred until the popover is open.

isReadOnly.description: If `true`, the form control will be readonly.

isRequired.description: If `true`, the form control will be required.

lazyBehavior.description:
The lazy behavior of popover's content when not visible. Only works when `isLazy={true}`

- `unmount`: The popover's content is always unmounted when not open.
- `keepMounted`: The popover's content initially unmounted, but stays mounted when popover is open.

locale.description:
The locale of the calendar.
Check the docs to see the locale of possible modifiers you can pass.

matchWidth.description:
If `true`, the popper will match the width of the reference at all times.
It's useful for `autocomplete`, `date-picker` and `select` patterns.

modifiers.description:
Array of popper.js modifiers.
Check the docs to see the list of possible modifiers you can pass.

monthFormat.description:
The format used for conversion.
Check the docs to see the format of possible modifiers you can pass.

offset.description: The main and cross-axis offset to displace popper element from its reference element.

onChangeMonth.description: The callback invoked when month state changes.

parseDate.description: Function that converts the input value to Date type.

pattern.description: The pattern used to check the <input> element's.

placement.description: The placement of the popper relative to its reference.

preventOverflow.description: If `true`, will prevent the popper from being cut off and ensure it's visible within the boundary area.

strategy.description: The CSS positioning strategy to use.
